channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- spice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- spice

item.title: CVE-2016-9577|2024-08-06T02:59:02.309Z -- red%20hat -- spice
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in SPICE before 0.13.90 in the server's protocol handling. An authenticated attacker could send crafted messages to the SPICE server causing a heap overflow leading to a crash or possible code execution.

item.title: CVE-2016-9578|2024-08-06T02:59:02.515Z -- red%20hat -- spice
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in SPICE before 0.13.90 in the server's protocol handling. An attacker able to connect to the SPICE server could send crafted messages which would cause the process to crash.
